metadata.title: CVE-2023-4641 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description: A flaw was found in shadow-utils. When asking for a new password,shadow-utils asks the password twice. If the password fails on the secondattempt, shadow-utils fails in cleaning the buffer used to store the firstentry. This may allow an attacker with enough access to retrieve thepassword from the memory.

criterions.comment: shadow: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
